useCase.name: Deploy New App Version with Updated Dataset Type

preconditions.precondition: The App Developer wants to deploy a new app version with an updated dataset type.

mainSequence.step: App Developer deploys new app version with updated dataset type.
Deployment System checks for updated dataset type.
Dataset Management deploys new version of the dataset type.
Dataset Type confirms successful deployment of the new version.
Dataset Management updates instances to the new dataset type version.
Dataset Instances confirm successful update of instances.
Dataset Management confirms the success of app and dataset deployment.
